name: Ludus (itch)
description:
Ludus is a top down shoot’em up game where you control a single soldier against numerous Roman legions.

Thanks to your personal selection of siege weapons you are able to take them on with some chance of success, but it will require a small amount of patience and strategy to reach the final boss.

Before each level you may choose one of three unique siege weapons to change how the battle plays out. Each one will have certain strengths and weaknesses depending on the level or layout of the soldiers, so some trial and error might be required to figure out the best solution.

Ludus contains 8 levels with unique environments and challenges in each one.
